templates.title: WXWA
templates.description: WXWA setup as a compose file

env.name: INSTANCE
env.label: Api instance number
env.description: Must be unique Instance number that is using for pai conaction https://instx.wxwa.wxloo.com/<instance> (e.g 01235)

env.name: TOKEN
env.label: Api token
env.description: Api token random string of  letters and  numbers, no spaces, no special chars ('j19ksidfxxcksm12213' if empty)

env.name: WEBHOOK
env.label: Webhook url
env.description: Url fo setup webhook if it is known ('https://wxwa.wxloo.com' if empty)

env.name: DOMAIN
env.label: Domain name
env.description: Domain for access to container. Use any  unsed subdomain of *.wxwx.wxloo.com, e.g: instx.wxwa.wxloo.com

env.name: WEBHOOK
env.label: Webhook url
env.description: Url fo setup webhook if it is known ('https://wxwa.wxloo.com' if empty)
